text:
The Pakistani anti-terrorism court holding the Mumbai attack trial has ordered the Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) to present all 24 Indian witnesses before it so that their statements can be recorded.

The Anti-Terrorism Court in Islamabad, which is holding the trial of the seven accused including Mumbai attack mastermind and LeT operations commander Zakiur Rehman Lakhvi, also directed that the boats used by Ajmal Kasab and others be brought back from India and made case property. — PTI
title: Pak. court orders deposition of Indian witnesses
